description: Configures a template and its files to be scaffolded. Docs: https://moonrepo.dev/docs/config/template

description.title: description
description.description: A description on what the template scaffolds.

destination.title: destination
destination.description: A pre-populated destination to scaffold to, relative from the workspace root when leading with /, otherwise the working directory.
destination.markdownDescription: A pre-populated destination to scaffold to, relative from the workspace root when leading with `/`, otherwise the working directory.

extends.title: extends
extends.description: Extends one or many other templates.

id.title: id
id.description: Overrides the ID of the template, instead of using the folder name.

title.title: title
title.description: A human-readable title for the template.
title.markdownDescription: A human-readable title for the template.

variables.title: variables
variables.description: A mapping of variables that'll be interpolated within each template file. Variables can also be populated by passing command line arguments.

default.title: default
default.description: The default value of the variable if none was provided.

internal.title: internal
internal.description: Marks the variable as internal, and won't be overwritten via CLI arguments.

order.title: order
order.description: The order in which variables should be prompted for.
